tier_1_determinative.voluntary_causing_or_attempting_death_hu: Not explicitly mentioned, but implied threat or use of force in robbery

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Abdulwafa Abubakhar Khan & Anr vs The State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.acts_and_sections: Indian Penal Code (IPC) Section 392 read with Section 34

residual_details.additional_facts: Appellant No.2 was in custody for more than two and a half years, and Appellant No.1 was in custody for about a year. Appellant No.1 is a young boy of 20 years with no antecedents. The sentence of imprisonment was reduced to the period already undergone, with a fine of Rs.500/- maintained for Appellant No.2 and increased to Rs.5000/- for Appellant No.1.
